text: okay George, it's time for the super jump!

I guess that's why mom tells me not to
jump on the bed
Mom, dad!
What is it Abi?
I broke George's house
Can i have the money to buy a new one for him?
I feel awful
Of course we can give you the money
But what would be more fun, is if you learn to earn

Isn't this fun George? I'm actually
earning my own money

And the more I work, the more I can earn
and save

And once we fill up the piggy bank, we
can go to the pet store and get you a new house
George, where did you go?
Dad, we raked up all the leaves!
Good job Abi, here you go!
Thank you

Maybe after we get paid from doing the
dishes we'll have enough money to buy you a new house
George, this is no time for a bath
You're a good little worker Abi
Still not enough money to buy you a new house
Hey, don't worry George, i know how we can make more money
Thank you, enjoy!

We have just the right amount of money,
let's go to the pet store!

Just look at it George, it's the
bestest little pet house ever

Daddy, i'm really hungry,
can we get some bread?
I'm hungry too honey
But we just don't have enough money for fancy bread like that
George, I know we both worked really hard to make this money

And i know a new pet house would make
you really happy but

True happiness comes from being kind
and helping others
Here, so you can buy the bread
That's very thoughtful of you but that's your money
It is, but i think you need it more righ tnow than i do
Sorry I can't get you a new house George
Abi, there's someone here to see you
Oh, hello! What are you doing here?
Well my dad is a carpenter
And you inspired me with your kindness
I know it's not quite the one you wanted from the pet store
But we wanted you to have this

No this one is much better that's
because it was made with love

Look at it George,
now that's the bestest pet house ever
